accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the system.

completeness.description: Whether the solution includes all necessary steps and information to reach the final answer.

efficiency.description: How efficiently the system processed the steps required to reach the final answer.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logic and reasoning steps that led to the final answer.

data_handling.description: How well the system managed data extraction, processing, and analysis.

software_requirements.description: Compliance with software requirements for tasks such as data manipulation.

robustness.description: The system's ability to handle errors and data anomalies.

communication_clarity.description: The clarity of communication between different agents and the output to the user.

response_timeliness.description: The speed at which the system provided the final answer.

scalability.description: The system's capability to handle larger or more complex versions of the task.
